wt.jfreechart

Class JFreeChartServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • wt.jfreechart.JFreeChartServlet

  • public final class JFreeChartServlet
extends HttpServlet
    Simple servlet to render JFreeChart charts directly to the servlet response stream.

    Supported API: true

    Extendable: false

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HEIGHT_PARAM_NAME
      Name of request parameter from which chart height is obtained; an internal default will be used if this is not provided

      Supported API: true
      static java.lang.String WIDTH_PARAM_NAME
      Name of request parameter from which chart width is obtained; an internal default will be used if this is not provided

      Supported API: true

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void setChart(ServletRequest request, JFreeChart chart)
      Sets the JFreeChart object for this servlet to render in the request object

      Supported API: true

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
